transcript.text:
￼


















Canvas Print
Multiple - Split Canvas Introduction

2 min
we have extended the canvas product feature to multiple and split canvas admin can now configure 3 different types of canvas from the system and offer as products to their customer the current system only allows you to add a single wall canvas product, the new version of the software will allow you to add the following canvas product types – single photo canvas multiple photo(s) canvas split photo canvas single photo canvas – in these types of canvases, a single picture is stretched into a frame canvas is most widely used as interior décor and customized with photographs know more https //help onprintshop com/add canvas product multiple photo canvas – in these types of canvases, a set of multiple art pieces with different photos is set on wall canvas split photo canvas – the split canvas has multiple art pieces but only a single photo is spread(laid) over all the art pieces
Did this page help you?
